attributes.action: Change the current system of unemployment benefits such that those receiving benefits must provide proof of effort to find employment or to prove that they have good reason not to seek employment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are too many people who are living off unemployment benefits without making an effort find employment or further education.

If these people had too provide documentary evidence that they were seeking employment or futher education then they would not get away with living off the taxpayers.
